user_query: I'm planning a trip to Asia and I need to know the time zones of different countries. Can you provide a list of countries in Asia along with their capital cities and time zones? It would be helpful to have the subregions within each country as well.

TaskList.description: Retrieve a list of all countries in Asia along with their capital cities.
For each country retrieved in step 1, get the time zone information.
required_inputs: list of countries and their capital cities

TaskList.description: Fetch the subregion information for each country.
